about.title: About Me
about.content: As an artist, I explore the delicate balance between form and emotion, creating pieces that invite viewers to experience art in a deeply personal way. My work is influenced by both classical techniques and contemporary expressions, resulting in a unique artistic voice that speaks to the modern audience while honoring traditional craftsmanship.
